laboratory_examinations.findings: 31.1 percent upon admission, 32.6 percent during examination.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable; measured twice daily remained stable.

laboratory_examinations.findings: One duodenal polyp measuring approximately 2.1 cm, diffusely dysplastic, with features consistent with high-grade dysplasia and intramucosal carcinoma.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression from non-dysplastic features in earlier polyps to high-grade dysplasia and intramucosal carcinoma at current admission.
